name: Freedom For Its Own Sake
description:
hi! this is our first bitsy game!
We pulled from 3 different essays written by 2 anarchist authors about games, play, and freedom.

[1] The Utopia of Rules, David Graeber 2015

[2] A Funny Thought on a New Way to Play, Alejandro de Acosta 2008

[3] What's the Point If We Can't Have Fun?, David Graeber 2014

For David Graeber 1961-2020
